snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes images of the way the Facebook-Instagram deal was reported, a Pentagon agency's drive to make humanlike robots and...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes images of the way the Facebook-Instagram deal was reported, a Pentagon agency's drive to make humanlike robots and an explanation of how AT&T iPhones can be unlocked.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Humanoid Robots and Unlocking iPhones
